languages.text: "Вы не поверите, но за пределами Дома Орселлио практика лишения слуг голоса далеко не столь распространена".

traits.locale_text: " Я сам{mf||а} устанавливаю традиции своей династии. И не смей меня учить!"

languages.text: "You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."
languages.original_text: "Вы не поверите, но за пределами Дома Орселлио практика лишения слуг голоса далеко не столь распространена".

traits.locale_text: "You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."
"You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."
"You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."
"You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."
"You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."

languages.text: “或许你会觉得难以置信，但剥夺仆人话语权这样的行为，在奥赛罗家族之外并不常见。”
languages.original_text: "You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: “或许你会觉得难以置信，但剥夺仆人话语权这样的行为，在奥塞罗家族之外并不常见。”

languages.text: «Tal vez le cueste creerlo, pero la práctica de privar a los sirvientes de su voz es poco común fuera de la casa Orsellio».
languages.original_text: "You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez le cueste creerlo, pero la práctica de privar a los sirvientes de su voz es poco común fuera de la casa Orsellio».

languages.text: 「信じがたいかもしれないが、使用人から声を奪うという習慣は、オーセリオ家の外ではそれほど広まってはいない」
languages.original_text: "You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: 「信じがたいかもしれないが、使用人から声を奪うという習慣は、オーセリオ家の外ではそれほど広まってはいない」

languages.text: "Ihr mögt es kaum glauben, doch die Praxis, Diener ihrer Stimme zu berauben, ist außerhalb von Haus Orsellio nicht sehr weit verbreitet."
languages.original_text: "You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr mögt es kaum glauben, doch die Praxis, Diener ihrer Stimme zu berauben, ist außerhalb von Haus Orsellio nicht sehr weit verbreitet."

languages.text: « Vous aurez peut-être du mal à le croire, mais en dehors de la maison Orsellio, priver ses serviteurs de leur voix n'est pas une pratique très répandue. »
languages.original_text: "You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: « Vous aurez peut-être du mal à le croire, mais en dehors de la maison Orsellio, priver ses serviteurs de leur voix n'est pas une pratique très répandue. »

languages.text: "İnanmakta zorlanabilirsin ama hizmetkârları seslerinden mahrum etmek, Orsellio Hanesi dışında pek de yaygın bir gelenek değil."
languages.original_text: "You may find it difficult to believe, but the practice of depriving servants of their voice is not particularly widespread outside House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: "Buna inanmakta zorlanabilirsin ama hizmetkârları seslerinden mahrum etmek, Orsellio Hanesi dışında pek de yaygın bir gelenek değil."
